avalancheActivity.highlights: Intense snowfall fell in E-winds last week that drifted and formed wind slabs in W-facing hills. A storm is coming on Thursday with intense rainfall in the mountains that will weaken the snowpack.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed in E-winds last week and windslabs and cornices have formed in W facing hills. Minor SV snowfall has been falling this week. There was not a lot of snow before the snowfall last week except high in the mountains but this older snow went through freeze-thaw cycles and is considered stable. Warming is expected for the next days with a rainstorm on Thursday that could temporarily destabilize the snowpack.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds last week. Most snowfall has occured in the North and East where a weakness in the snowpack has been discovered. Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday that could further destabilize the snowpack in all regions before it freezes again and the snowpack gets more stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds.  Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á miðvikudag má búast við SV snjókomu til fjalla en rigningu á láglendi. Á fimmtudag gengur yfir hríðarveður í sunnan 30-40 m/sek og slyddu og rigningu til fjalla. Hiti allt að 7 stig en frystir eftir veðrið.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Increasing snow on Wednesday during S/SW winds. Considerable snowfall the night before Thursday during temporary E/NE wnd.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Increasing snow on Wednesday during S/SW winds, so windslabs will most likely form on northerly aspects. Little snow was in the area but most likely some windslabs on southwesterly aspects. Considerable snowfall the night before Thursday during temporary E/NE wind, but quickly turining again to southerly winds.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds last week. Most snowfall has occured in the North and East where a weakness in the snowpack has been discovered. Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday that could further destabilize the snowpack in all regions before it freezes again and the snowpack gets more stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds.  Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday.

weatherForecast.highlights: S/SV-áttir að 15 m/s á miðvikudag og snjókoma með köflum. Aðfaranótt fimmtudags snýst í skammvinna A/NA 5-13 m/s með talsverðri snjókomu. Snýst fljótlega í suðlæga átt með éljum.

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanches have been falling in the region in various facies. Avalanche was reported from Hrafnabjargarhnjúkur in Karlsárdalur on Thursday that most likely fell on a weak layer boundary between old freeze-thaw snow and a windslab. On Friday, a large slab avalanche of size 2.5 fell in Burstabrekkudalur along with two smaller ones. On Sunday, another small avalanche fell in the same valley.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Between a layer of new and older snow is a weakness with faceting that formed in the recent frost episode. A lot of new snow fell last week and windslabs could be in variable facies on top of a weak layer. A storm is coming on Thursday with intense snowfall in the mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of snow fell last week in N-winds but a lot has also drifted in S-winds after the weekend. NW snowfall also fell on Monday. A weakness can be found in the snowpack on the layer boundary between this new snow and older freeze-thaw snow. Windslabs could be present in various facies on top of this layer boundary. Snowpits have confirmed that this weakness is caused by faceting in the layer boundary and stability tests showed a failure with low to medium load. Whumpfs and a remote triggered avalanche further confirm that this weak layer is widespread and the snowpack unstable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds last week. Most snowfall has occured in the North and East where a weakness in the snowpack has been discovered. Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday that could further destabilize the snowpack in all regions before it freezes again and the snowpack gets more stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds.  Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á miðvikudag má búast við SV snjókomu til fjalla en rigningu á láglendi. Á fimmtudag gengur yfir hríðarveður í sunnan 30-40 m/sek. Snjókoma verður til fjalla en slydda og rigning á láglendi. Hlýindi ná upp í fjallstoppa víða en fljótlega frystir eftir veðrið.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few sluffs were seen on Sunday. A few slab avalanches occurred in Eskifjörður after the snowfall last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Updated. Layered windslabs have most likely formed on most aspects. A weak layer of facets has been found between windslabs and the underlying hardpacked snow. Warm weather on Thursday could cause wet avalanches.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Layered windslabs have most likely formed on most aspects. A weak layere of facets has been found between the old hardpacked snow and windslabs. Increasing southerly wind on Wednesday and Thursday with snow likely drifting to northerly aspects. Rising temperature and rain on Thursday could cause wet avalanches.

travelAdvisory.comment: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds last week. Most snowfall has occured in the North and East where a weakness in the snowpack has been discovered. Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday that could further destabilize the snowpack in all regions before it freezes again and the snowpack gets more stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Windslabs are present in most regions after snowfall and variable winds.  Thawing weather with intense precipitation is expected for Thursday.

weatherForecast.highlights: Vaxandi suðlæg átt á miðvikudag og hlýnar. Hvessir enn frekar á fimmtudag, 18-28 m/s um hádegi með rigningu. Skilin ganga yfir seinnipartinn, kólnar og dregur þá hratt úr vindi. Á föstudag er útlit fyrir suðvestlæga átt með dálítilli snjókomu.
